en_text: For 2 turns, increase ATK by 20% for each Enhanced Fire Orbs, Enhanced Light Orbs, and Enhanced Heal Orbs awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: 仁愛のルビー
jp_skill.raw_description: 2ターンの間、チーム内の火光回復ドロップ強化の 覚醒数に応じて攻撃力が上昇。

kr_skill.name: 인애의 루비
kr_skill.raw_description: 2턴 동안 팀 내의 불, 빛, 회복드롭 강화의 각성수에 따라 공격력이 상승

na_skill.name: Ruby of Charity
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Enhanced Fire, Light, Heal Orbs] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns
